name: Venia (a psychedelic horror) [Prolog-Demo Ver.1.0_Ger]
description:
Venia is a psychedelic horror, which tells the story of Levi, how he and his life goes on after a tragic accident of his girlfriend Fiona.

This game currently has a prologue demo, but only in German.
I will submit an English version later, but it could take some time.
